items.title: Copper records biggest annual gain since 2009 on supply bets
items.description: Copper had its best year since 2009, fueled by near-term supply tightness and bets that demand for the metal key in electrification will outpace produ...

items.title: Gold and silver stumble at the end of best year since the 1970s
items.description: “In my career, it’s unprecedented,” said John Reade, a market veteran and chief strategist at the World Gold Council.

items.title: Dollar set for worst year since 2017 with Fed drama center stage
items.description: “The biggest factor for the dollar in first quarter will be the Fed,” said Yusuke Miyairi, a foreign-exchange strategist at Nomura.

items.title: Canadian stocks set record for records in ‘jaw-dropping’ year
items.description: “The numbers themselves are somewhat jaw dropping,” said IG Wealth Management chief investment strategist Philip Petursson by phone.

items.title: China buys two-thirds of pledged U.S. soybeans as 2025 closes
items.description: The return of Chinese buyers is welcome news for U.S. exporters, and a reminder that buying patterns can change fast — but it is not yet a full reset.
